vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.editorscreens.mapeditor

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.editorscreens.mapeditor.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Grid
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    This class holds a tile element that is drawn on the MapMaker screen. It enables the creation of paths. The tile is snapped to the grid when the game maker clicks on the grid.
    Author:
    Leonard K. Ng'eno
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
